headline: Starboard Value LP Opens Major Stake in Clearwater Analytics’ Investment Accounting Platform
summary: Starboard Value LP has established a significant position in Clearwater Analytics, a provider of cloud-based investment accounting software for insurers and asset managers. The company is embedded within the back-office infrastructure of institutional portfolios, where systems are challenging to replace and regulatory reporting is ever-present.
